subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal will miss Spain’s Davis Cup quarterfinal clash with the United States next month to rest, and complained that the tournament risked losing its prestige because of “inconsiderate” scheduling.
snippet: Rafael Nadal will miss Spain’s Davis Cup quarterfinal clash with the United States next month to rest, and complained that the tournament risked losing its prestige because of “inconsiderate” scheduling.
